item.description:
WE HAD FOR A COUPLE OF TIMES WINTER PARTY AT THE BROOK HOUSE FUNCTION ROOM, NOW WE CAN ENJOY A WARM COMPANY OVER BBQ PRACTICE FOR THE SEASON!

SPACY COMFORTABLE LARGE AREA OF FUNCTION ROOM, PATIO WITH BBQ, TABLES, CHAIRS. VERY PLEASANT, ELEGANT AND COZY!

 WITH SUGGESTIONS, QUESTIONS, HELPERS, PLEASE EMAIL.

PLEASE RSVP WITH WHAT ARE YOU PLANNING TO BRING AS A DISH FOR POT LUCK!

LOOKING FORWARD!

MAIA 781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: warm up BBQ!!
